name: KSLNewsradioWeatherReport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Don't get caught out in the rain, sleet, snow or wind unprepared. Catch up on the very latest forecast information from KSL meteorologists, every ten minutes when you’re getting ready to go to work or come home, and twice an hour the rest of your day.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
